channel.title: Need help with people connecting to server!
channel.description:
Hello All, i am used to private servers, i have run my own private server awhile ago, about a year ago i would say. I recently put xp on my computer and took out vista. I decided to run a private server again. I got uTorrent, and server base, a client and a no-ip account. I made a No-IP account and ip, got my uTorrent port to 43594, im trying to get my cousin to connect with the IP i made with the No-IP account. I downloaded the No-Ip duc thing that show's up in the task bar.
If anyone could help i'd apprechiate it very much, i have msn also and Teamviewer (Remote Control Desktop Sharing)
Please & Thankyou, -Spyder.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 17, 2009, 09:12:01 pm[/size][hr]Anyone?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 18, 2009, 10:42:30 am[/size][hr]Anyone?

item.title: Need help with people connecting to server!
